name: New Yankee 7: Deer Hunters
description: Pursue a snow-white deer through an enchanted forest and discover a magical mystery in the days of King Arthur! Answer the call of a king and begin the hunt today!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 750 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB 3D video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB 3D video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
